Sales Manager
Senior Sales Executive (Excellent English Communication skills are MUST!)
Network / Network Security Engineer
System Engineer
Network Engineer Intern
Manager Electronics
Business Intelligence Developer (BI Developer)
Electrician
Senior Accountant
HR Generalist
Full Stack Developer
Corporate Lawyer (Female Candidates are Encouraged to Apply)
Sales Manager

SALES MANAGER

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. To meet quarterly and Annual Revenue and Profitability objectives
2. To ensure account coverage of the respective Regions & bring in new accounts
3. To build strong sales team in the regions
4. To ensure and manage account receivables. And collections as per the commitment to the finance.
5. To ensure extensive support to project management for in time project completion
6. To develop process and procedures for sales team that will enhance efficiency of the company.
7. To ensure proper costing, commercial compliance, proposals and submittals.
8. Ensure a constant learning process to enhance personal and team technical knowledge of products that GCS sells.
9. To enable the team to sell cross brands and value-added business.
10. To achieve sales target as per assigned sale targets.
11. Should be able to set sales targets in alignment with company goals and assist the team to achieve their targets is respective region.
12. Drive planning and formation of marketing and sales strategy.
13. Hold regular internal sales meetings to review performance and manage expectation.
Qualifications :
Bachelor / Masters
Experience :

5+ years (Only IT, Security & Surveillance Industry)

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at tayyaba.azmat@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves, Sales Commission

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Senior Sales Executive (Excellent English Communication skills are MUST!)

SENIOR SALES EXECUTIVE (EXCELLENT ENGLISH COMMUNICATION SKILLS ARE MUST!)

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Cultivating solid relationships with major customers to ensure a continuous flow of sales revenue.
2. Identifying promising prospects through cold-calling, networking, and customer referral.
3. Ensuring that all sales administration and customer service activities run smoothly.
4. Tender Documentation and working on business Proposals.
5. Providing overall guidance to newly recruited Sales Representatives.
6. Maintaining accurate records of the total number of sales made, potential and existing customers, as well as sales employee performance evaluations.
7. Analyzing sales metrics to determine whether current sales strategies are effective.
Qualifications :
Bachelors / MBA (Should know how to manage the accounts)
Experience :

1 – 2   years

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at tayyaba.azmat@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Network / Network Security Engineer

NETWORK / NETWORK SECURITY ENGINEER

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Strong Command on Network security, Firewalls, VM Ware, SAN, HA, ACL etc is required.
2. Designing, configuring and testing networking software, computer hardware, and operating system software.
3. Assist in the configuration and deployment of core and peripheral network devices, which will require continuous learning of new devices (i.e., switches, routers, servers, etc.)
4. Troubleshooting, diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and other network and system problems.
5. Work closely with the fellow tech team members to provide end-user support and issue resolution.
Qualifications :
BS or B.E (Electrical/Electronic/Telecom Engineering)
Experience :

4-6 years’ relevant work experience

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at tayyaba.azmat@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

System Engineer

SYSTEM ENGINEER

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Designing, configuring and testing networking software, computer hardware, and operating system software.
2. Command on managing data centers, servers, storage and (WINDOWS/LINUX).
3. Work closely with the fellow tech team members to provide end-user support and issue resolution.
Qualifications :
BS or B.E (Electrical/Electronic/Telecom Engineering)
Experience :

4-6 years’ relevant work experience

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at tayyaba.azmat@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Network Engineer Intern

NETWORK ENGINEER INTERN

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Assisting line manager in designing, configuring and testing networking software, computer hardware, and operating system software.
2. Assisting in the configuration and deployment of core and peripheral network devices, which will require continuous learning of new devices (i.e., switches, routers, servers, etc.)
3. Troubleshooting, diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and other network and system problems.
4. Working closely with the fellow tech team members to provide end-user support and issue resolution.
Qualifications :
BS or B.E (Electrical/Electronic/Telecom Engineering)
Experience :

Fresh or Internship Experience

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at tayyaba.azmat@gcspvt.com

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Manager Electronics

MANAGER ELECTRONICS

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Installation, Commissioning, Maintenance and Servicing of UPS and Battery bank. Design electronic systems, products, software and components.
2. Preparation of submittals and sequence of operation SOP for the system with consultant as per client requirements.
3. Prepare tender documentation, preparation of bids/quotations/Invoice /offers etc.
4. Analyze customer needs to determine the costs, capacity and requirements for creating an electrical system plan.
5. Create testing procedures and maintenance for electronic equipment and components.
6. Recommend design modifications and equipment repair.
7. Must have technical expertise on Switching & Routing Protocols, Processors, Neural Network Algorithms, PCB Design Tools and Simulators.
8. Inspect electronic systems, instruments and equipment to ensure they meet applicable regulations and safety standards.
Qualifications :
Masters or Bachelors in Electronics Engineering
Experience :

5-7 years’ relevant work experience

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at tayyaba.azmat@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Business Intelligence Developer (BI Developer)

BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE DEVELOPER (BI DEVELOPER)

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

Candidates with Experience in Pentaho & LinceBI will be Strongly Preferred!

1. Strong development skill set with hands-on experience of Business Intelligence and Analytical solutions.
2. Must have expertise in SQL Queries.
3. Must have experience in BI Dashboard development using by BI Tool.
4. Database maintaining and backup/ archiving.
5. Change management and business rule for the Business intelligence system.
6. Database customization documentation, flow chart.
7. Must have expertise in SQL Queries.
8. Data interface with external systems for simulation, financial analysis, statistical reporting and dashboard creating.
9. Different reporting tools for KPI monitoring.
10. Integration experience, database administration, data warehousing, power B.I, Big Data, MySQL, Oracle.
11. Data collection, analysis for data modeling, predictive forecasting and simulation.
12. Perform high-level data analysis, dashboard interface design, and BI documentation.
13. Communicate and present analysis to customer with rapid modification on the reports.
Qualifications :
BS / BE in Computer Science / Software Engineering; MS / ME degree is a plus
Experience :

2 years or more

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at tayyaba.azmat@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Electrician

ELECTRICIAN

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Installing, maintaining, and repairing electrical control, wiring, and lighting systems.
2. Reading technical diagrams and blueprints.
3. Performing general electrical maintenance.
4. Inspecting transformers, circuit breakers, and other electrical components.
5. Troubleshooting electrical issues using appropriate testing devices.
6. Repairing and replacing equipment, electrical wiring, and fixtures.
7. Following National Electrical Code state and local building regulations.
8. Performing circuit breaker corrective maintenance.
9. Maintaining good knowledge of heating and air conditioning systems as well as various testing equipment.

Qualifications :
Intermediate / DAE
Experience :

6 months -1 years

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at hr@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Senior Accountant

SENIOR ACCOUNTANT

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Weekly Account Receivable Aging
2. Issuance of Invoices
3. Recording of Receipts
4. Reconciliation of Customer/Vendor ledger
5. To assist in taxation filing
6. Processing of Daily Payments
7. Verification of Petty Cash Bills
8. Verifying, allocating, posting and reconciling accounts payable and receivable
9. Producing error-free accounting reports and present their results
10. Provide input into department’s goal setting process
11. Assist with tax audits and tax returns
12. Direct internal and external audits to ensure compliance
13. Support month-end and year-end close process

Qualifications :
Bachelor’s/Masters/ACCA
Experience :

2 years -3 years

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at hr@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

HR Generalist

HR GENERALIST

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Assist in talent acquisition and recruitment processes
2. Conduct employee onboarding and help organize training & development initiatives
3. Provide support to employees in various HR-related topics such as leaves and compensation and resolve any issues that may arise
4. Promote HR programs to create an efficient and conflict-free workplace
5. Assist in development and implementation of human resource policies
6. Undertake tasks around performance management
7. Administer compensation and benefit plans
8. Gather and analyze data with useful HR metrics, like time to hire and employee turnover rates
9. Organize quarterly and annual employee performance reviews
10. Maintain employee files and records in electronic and paper form
11. Enhance job satisfaction by resolving issues promptly, applying new perks and benefits and organizing team building activities
12. Ensure compliance with labor regulations

Qualifications :
Bachelor’s/Masters in HR
Experience :

2 years -3 years

Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :

Send updated CV at hr@gcspvt.com

Benefits :

Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves

Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Full Stack Developer

FULL STACK DEVELOPER

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions
2. Design client-side and server-side architecture
3. Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design
4. Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications
5. Write effective APIs
6. Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
7. Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software
8. Create security and data protection settings
9. Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
10. Write technical documentation
11. Work with data scientists and analysts to improve software
Qualifications :
Bachelors in computer studies
Skill :
ASP.NET Core, Web APIs, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web Forms, Windows Forms – C#, Entity Framework, Database Designing (SQL Server, MySQL, Mongo DB), Angular, React, jQuery, TypeScript, Javascript, NodeJS, Bootstrap, Mobile Application Development (Xamarine/Native/React/Flutter) would be preferred.
Experience :
1 years – 2 years
Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :
Send updated CV at hr@gcspvt.com
Benefits :
Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves
Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.

Corporate Lawyer (Female Candidates are Encouraged to Apply)

CORPORATE LAWYER (Female Candidates are Encouraged to Apply)

RESPONSIBILITIES & REQUIREMENTS

1. Monitor legal risk in documentation and give guidance on the acceptable assumption of risk
2. Interpret laws, rulings, and regulations
3. Conduct legal research and gather evidence
4. Ensure that appropriate approvals are in place before documents are executed
5. Explain the law and give legal advice
6.Offer legal representation at arbitration hearings
7. Facilitate innovative solutions to problems
8. Prepare the appropriate legal documents for tender submission or court proceedings
9. Evaluate new business partnerships with vendors and subcontractors
10. Design and oversee the company’s policy and position on legal matters
11. Protect the company against legal risks and violations
12. Negotiate deals on behalf of the company
13. Guide management on regulatory and compliance issues to ensure compliance with legal regulations
Qualifications :
LLB
Skill :
-Experience in drafting, negotiating and reviewing legal documents
-Analytical thinker with strong conceptual and research skills
-Excellent interpersonal, ENGLISH communication and public speaking skills.
 
Experience :
4 years – 5 years
Location :

On-site, Karachi.

Application Instructions :
Send updated CV at careers@gcspvt.com
Benefits :
Health & Life Insurance (Employee, Spouse & Kids), Leaves
Contact Information:

(021) 34312453, Ext 7005

Deadline :

None.
